text: ام خلقوا۟ من غير شىء ام هم الخلقون

translations.translation: Or were they created out of nothing, or are they the creators?
Or were they created of themselves? Or are they the creators?
Did they come into being without any creator? Or were they their own creators?
Have they been created from nothing or are they themselves their own creators?
Have they not been created from some source, or are they themselves the creators?
Or were they created by nothing Or were they themselves the creators
Or were they created without there being anything, or are they the creators?
Or were they created out of nothing? Or are they the creators?
Or were they created out of naught? Or are they the creators?
Were they created out of nothing, or are they their own creators?
Have they not been created by aught, or are they the creators?
Were they created from nothing? Or are they [their own] creators?
Were they created of nothing, or were they themselves the creators?
Were they created by nothing, or were they themselves the creators?
Or, were they created out of nothing? Or, were they their own creators?
Or were they created out of nothing? Or are they the creators?
Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?

[52:35] Or were they created out of nothing?, [that is] without a Creator. Or are they the creators?, of themselves. It makes no sense for a created thing to have no creator, nor can a thing that will cease to existent [have the power to] create. There must be a Creator of them, and that is God, the One, so why do they not affirm His Oneness and believe in His Messenger and His Book?
(Or were they created out of naught) without a father; and it is also said: without a Lord? (Or are they the creators) rather than being the created?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
أيصرون على إنكار الخالق مع أنهم مخلوقون { أَمْ } اعتقدوا أنهم { خُلِقُواْ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَيْءٍ } وبلا فاعل موجد { أَمْ } اعتقدوا نفوسهم أنهم { هُمُ ٱلْخَالِقُونَ } [الطور: 35] المستقلون على إيجاد هياكلهم بلا مؤثر خارجي هو الله
 أيحصرون حينئذ خالقيتهم لأنفسهم فقط؟!

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
فلا يتوجه عليهم حساب ولا عقاب؟ { أم هم الخالقون } المُوجدون لأنفسهم؟ فيلزم عليه الدور
 وهو تقدُّم الشيء على نفسه وتأخُّره عنها
